Order Management

1 min
the sales process can be divided into two parts order management and quote to order the quote to order section is responsible for quoting products, configuring them, and authorizing orders the order management process, on the other hand, is concerned with contracting and shipping both steps are required to confirm any transaction and must be carried out with the highest transparency and efficiency learn how you can manage the orders as well as quotes from customers order management docid\ ufz1bx9hcrx8ieenjjow0 quote management docid\ bskclvp1avhgyamjchq69
